28
29#ifndef _UMEM_H
30#define _UMEM_H
31
32
33
34#include <sys/types.h>
35#include <stdlib.h>
36
37#ifdef __cplusplus
38extern "C" {
39#endif
40
41#define UMEM_DEFAULT 0x0000 /* normal -- may fail */
42#define UMEM_NOFAIL 0x0100 /* Never fails -- may call exit(2) */
43
44#define UMEM_FLAGS 0xffff /* all settable umem flags */
45
46extern void *umem_alloc(size_t, int);
47extern void *umem_alloc_align(size_t, size_t, int);
48extern void *umem_zalloc(size_t, int);
49extern void umem_free(void *, size_t);
50extern void umem_free_align(void *, size_t);
51
52/*
53 * Flags for umem_cache_create()
54 */
55#define UMC_NOTOUCH 0x00010000
56#define UMC_NODEBUG 0x00020000
57#define UMC_NOMAGAZINE 0x00040000
58#define UMC_NOHASH 0x00080000
59
60struct umem_cache; /* cache structure is opaque to umem clients */
61
62typedef struct umem_cache umem_cache_t;
63typedef int umem_constructor_t(void *, void *, int);
64typedef void umem_destructor_t(void *, void *);
65typedef void umem_reclaim_t(void *);
66
67typedef int umem_nofail_callback_t(void);
68#define UMEM_CALLBACK_RETRY 0
69#define UMEM_CALLBACK_EXIT(status) (0x100 | ((status) & 0xFF))
70
71extern void umem_nofail_callback(umem_nofail_callback_t *);
72
73extern umem_cache_t *umem_cache_create(char *, size_t,
74 size_t, umem_constructor_t *, umem_destructor_t *, umem_reclaim_t *,
75 void *, void *, int);
76extern void umem_cache_destroy(umem_cache_t *);
77
78extern void *umem_cache_alloc(umem_cache_t *, int);
79extern void umem_cache_free(umem_cache_t *, void *);
80
81extern void umem_reap(void);
82
83#ifdef __cplusplus
84}
85#endif
86
87#endif /* _UMEM_H */
88
